author: Medea Giordano, Jeffrey Van Camp
title: How to Make a CDC-Approved Cloth Face Mask (and Rules to Follow)
description: A fabric face covering won't protect you from getting Covid-19, but might help prevent you from spreading the virus if you must leave the house.
content: The time has come to start covering your face. As we reported April 3, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention now recommends all citizens voluntarily wear a cloth face mask for essential trips out of the house to the grocery store, doctor, or other… [+2403 chars]
